summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rock International Bullion MVP. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly. Contact form integration with MongoDB successful.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/products returns all 4 gold bar products (1g, 100g, 1kg, 400oz)
Backend API /api/spot-price returns mocked gold price data ($2650.50)
Backend API /api/leads POST successfully saves leads to MongoDB
Backend API /api/leads GET retrieves stored leads
Home page loads with hero section, gold spot price display, Why Choose Us cards, Featured Products grid, and CTA section
Products page displays all 4 gold bar products with images, details, and Request Price buttons
Services page shows all 4 service offerings (Custom Gold Acquisition, Investor Bulk Purchase, Secure Vaulting, International Insured Delivery)
About page displays David Rock's profile and commitment section
Contact page form submission works - successfully saves lead to database with success message
Navigation between all pages works correctly
RIB logo and 'Rock International Bullion' branding appears in navbar
Footer shows New York | London locations
No physical addresses displayed anywhere (privacy requirement met)
